  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Redacción (sustantivos)</string>
            <string language="en">Essay (nouns)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versuch (Gegenstandswörter)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai (noms)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Essay (substantivos)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saggio (nomi)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκίμιο (ουσιαστικά)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se propone realizar una redacción, de no más de seis líneas, que incluya seis sustantivos propuestos. Se trata, sobre todo, de un ejercicio de creación literaria.</string>
            <string language="en">The unit proposes writing an essay. It should be at most six lines long and should include six suggested nouns. It is principally an exercise in literary creation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Sustantivos</string>
            <string language="en">Nouns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Redacción</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Maßeinheit schlägt vor, einen Versuch zu 
schreiben. Es sollte höchstens sechs Zeilen lang sein und 
sollte sechs vorgeschlagene Gegenstandswörter einschließen. Es
ist allgemein eine Übung in der literarischen Kreation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'unité propose d'écrire un essai. Ce 
devrait être tout au plus six lignes longtemps et devrait inclure six
noms suggérés. C'est principalement un exercice dans la 
création littéraire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade propõe escrever um essay. Deve 
ser em a maioria seis linhas por muito tempo e deve incluir seis 
substantivos sugeridos. É principalmente um exercício na 
criação literária.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'unità propone di scrivere un saggio. 
Dovrebbe essere tutt'al più sei righe lungamente e dovrebbe 
includere sei nomi suggeriti. È principalmente un'esercitazione
nella creazione letteraria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μονάδα προτείνει ένα δοκίμιο. Πρέπει να 
είναι το πολύ-πολύ οι περισσότερες έξι γραμμές μακροχρόνιες και
πρέπει να περιλάβει έξι προτεινόμενα ουσιαστικά. Είναι 
κυρίως μια άσκηση στη λογοτεχνική δημιουργία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenstandswörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substantivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nomi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσιαστικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
